Name: Golden Screw
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into chilled glass and lightly stir.
Review: A favourite with the Midas and others whose budgets extend beyond a Buck's Fizz or a Mimosa .
Nutrition: One serving of Golden Screw contains 81 calories
